metadata.instruction: HOW DO WE STANDARDIZE X TO GET Z ~ N(0, 1)?
metadata.explanation: To standardize, subtract the mean and divide by standard deviation: Z = (X - Î¼)/Ïƒ = (X - 95)/6.
